ref: 3046 kāmpīla1 m. ʻ name of a plant ʼ Kauś., ˚pilya -- , ˚pilla- m. lex., kampīla -- n. ʻ pigment from Rottleria tinctoria ʼ lex., kampilya -- m. lex., ˚aka -- , ˚pilvaka -- m. Car., ˚pilla -- , ˚aka -- m. Suśr.
K. kö̃bil m. ʻ a certain medicinal plant used as a cure for herpes ʼ;
S. kambīro m. ʻ hairs from the fruit of Rottleria tinctoria (used as a red dye and as a drug) ʼ;
H. kamīlā, ˚melā m. ʻ a drug obtained from the capsules of Rottleria tinctoria (used as a vermifuge and aphrodisiac) ʼ.
